content: {"locationId": "1880", "organizationId": "1678", "name": "The Lords Storehouse Food Pantry of Piatt County", "address1": "115 Dodge St.", "address2": "", "city": "Cisco", "state": "IL", "zipCode": "61830", "country": null, "phone": "217-521-8450", "phoneExt": "", "website": null, "latitude": "40.01178", "longitude": "-88.726402", "foodPrograms": "Food Distribution", "serviceAreas": "COUNTY:  Piatt", "languages": "", "features": "Air Conditioning", "aboutUs": "The Lord's Storehouse Food Pantry of Piatt County's mission is to provide food for our friends and neighbors in need, while treating them with respect during difficult times.
